name: Royal Mail Group
membership: Royal Mail Group is a member of PostEurop (ww.posteurop.org), EMOTA (www.emota.eu) and FEDMA (www.fedma.org). It is also a shareholder of the International Post Corporation (www.ipc.be).
goal:
Royal Mail Group is one of the largest delivery companies in Europe and comprises Royal Mail, Parcelforce Worldwide and General Logistics Systems (GLS):

Royal Mail is proud to be the universal postal service provider in the UK, delivering a six-days-a-week, one-price-goes-anywhere postal service to more than 29 million addresses.

Parcelforce Worldwide operates a separate UK network for express parcels.

GLS is our ground based, deferred parcels business operating in 43 countries across wider Europe, Canada and the United States.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Postal Services Directive
Digital Single Market
VAT
Data Protection
International trade
